mapper.select:
select id,title,business_type,method,request_method,operator_type,oper_name,dept_name,oper_url,oper_ip,oper_param,json_result,status,error_msg,oper_time,create_time,update_time,is_deleted from sys_oper_log
and title like concat('%',concat(#{vo.title},'%'))
and oper_name like concat('%',concat(#{vo.operName},'%'))
and create_time >= #{vo.createTimeBegin}
and create_time < #{vo.createTimeEnd}
and is_deleted = 0
order by id desc
